content: I'm considering buying the property I'm currently renting in the city, but we need to assess what renovations would be needed to make it our own. The backyard is a mess, and we'd need to invest in some serious landscaping to make it livable. On the other hand, the location is perfect, and the natural light in the living room is amazing. Can you suggest some specific questions I should ask potential contractors to ensure they understand our needs and can work within our budget?
